turns.content: Plan a trip in Dubai and Abu Dabi on 1 week for a couple. We want to visit different cool places. All day should be planned. We want to visit both cities. We have a low budget. Make you answer in a markdown format. One day one table. Indicate a cost of visit if it is not free. Mark most important places with a star. place several days to spend time on a beach

Day 1: Arrival in Dubai
=======================

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Arrive in Dubai | - |
| Afternoon | Check into a budget hotel | - |
| Evening | Visit Al Seef District\* | Free |

Day 2: Dubai
============

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Jumeirah Beach\* | Free |
| Afternoon | Visit the Mall of the Emirates | Free |
| Evening | Dubai Mall & Dubai Fountain\* | Free |

Day 3: Dubai
============

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Al Fahidi Historical Neighborhood\* | Free |
| Afternoon | Visit JBR, The Beach | Free |
| Evening | Global Village (seasonal)\* | ~$5 |

Day 4: Abu Dhabi
================

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Travel to Abu Dhabi | ~$10 |
| Afternoon | Visit Sheikh Zayed Mosque\* | Free |
| Evening | Relax at the Corniche Beach\* | Free |

Day 5: Abu Dhabi
================

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Heritage Village | Free |
| Afternoon | Emirates Park Zoo | ~$9 |
| Evening | Qasr Al Hosn\* | Free |

Day 6: Beach Day
================

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Saadiyat Public Beach\* | Free |
| Afternoon | Continue at Saadiyat Beach | - |
| Evening | Visit Yas Marina & Yas Mall | Free |

Day 7: Return to Dubai & Departure
==================================

| Time | Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Travel back to Dubai | ~$10 |
| Afternoon | Souk Madinat Jumeirah | Free |
| Evening | Depart from Dubai Airport | - |

This plan includes a mix of cultural, leisure, and beach activities. Most attractions are free or low-cost, keeping your budget in mind. Enjoy your trip!

Middle Budget Activities
========================

| Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- |
| At The Top, Burj Khalifa | ~$37 |
| Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo | ~$28 |
| Louvre Abu Dhabi | ~$17 |

Recommended Low & Middle Budget Restaurants
===========================================

| Place | Average Check | Famous Dish |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Ravi Restaurant, Dubai | ~$10 | Chicken Biryani |
| Al Mallah, Dubai | ~$8 | Shawarma |
| Al Fanar Restaurant, Dubai | ~$20 | Machboos |
| Automatic Restaurant, Abu Dhabi | ~$10 | Mixed Grill |
| Al Ibrahimi, Abu Dhabi | ~$12 | Mutton Haneeth |
| Man'oushe Street, Abu Dhabi | ~$6 | Zaatar Man'oushe |

Now you have a revised schedule with full days available in both cities, along with a table of middle-budget activities and recommended low & middle budget restaurants to try. Enjoy your trip!
add x3 more options to last 2 tables

Additional Low & Middle Budget Restaurants
==========================================

| Place | Average Check | Famous Dish |

With these additional options for middle-budget activities and low & middle budget restaurants, you'll have more choices for an enjoyable trip in Dubai and Abu Dhabi. Have a great time!

Additional Low Budget Activities
================================

Dubai
-----

| Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- |
| Creek Park | ~$3 |
| Al Qudra Lake | Free |
| Jumeirah Mosque (Guided Tour) | ~$7 |
| Alserkal Avenue Art Galleries | Free |

Abu Dhabi
---------

| Activity | Cost |
| --- | --- |
| Umm Al Emarat Park | ~$3 |
| Mangrove National Park Kayaking | ~$27 |
| Central Market (Souk) | Free |
| Etihad Towers Observation Deck | ~$21 |

These additional low budget activities in Dubai and Abu Dhabi offer a diverse range of experiences, from outdoor parks and lakes to art galleries and markets. With these options, you'll have even more ways to enjoy your trip while staying within your budget.
